short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WA Bulk Sender - Send Messages, Attachments, Personalized Message, auto reply and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: chatbot is a computer program that simulates and processes human conversation (either written or spoken), allowing humans to interact with digital devices as if they were communicating with a real person.
